# Data Protection and Privacy: Course Resources

This page contains additional resources, references, and tools to support your learning journey in data protection and privacy.

## Regulatory Frameworks and Guidance

### GDPR Resources
- [Official EU GDPR Portal](https://gdpr.eu/) - Complete guide to GDPR compliance
- [European Data Protection Board Guidelines](https://edpb.europa.eu/our-work-tools/general-guidance/guidelines-recommendations-best-practices_en) - Authoritative guidance
- [ICO Guide to GDPR](https://ico.org.uk/for-organisations/guide-to-data-protection/guide-to-the-general-data-protection-regulation-gdpr/) - UK supervisory authority guidance
- [GDPR Enforcement Tracker](https://www.enforcementtracker.com/) - Database of GDPR fines and penalties

### US Privacy Laws
- [California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) Text](https://cppa.ca.gov/regulations/cpra_regulations.html) - Official text and regulations
- [California Privacy Protection Agency](https://cppa.ca.gov/) - Regulatory authority for California privacy laws
- [Virginia Consumer Data Protection Act (VCDPA)](https://law.lis.virginia.gov/vacode/title59.1/chapter52/) - Virginia's comprehensive privacy law
- [Colorado Privacy Act](https://coag.gov/resources/colorado-privacy-act/) - Colorado's privacy legislation
- [FTC Privacy Resources](https://www.ftc.gov/business-guidance/privacy-security) - Federal Trade Commission guidance

### Global Privacy Laws
- [IAPP Global Privacy Law and DPA Directory](https://iapp.org/resources/article/global-privacy-law-and-dpa-directory/) - Comprehensive global resource
- [Brazil's LGPD (in English)](https://iapp.org/resources/article/brazilian-data-protection-law-lgpd-english-translation/) - English translation
- [Canada's PIPEDA](https://www.priv.gc.ca/en/privacy-topics/privacy-laws-in-canada/the-personal-information-protection-and-electronic-documents-act-pipeda/) - Office of the Privacy Commissioner of Canada
- [Australia's Privacy Act](https://www.oaic.gov.au/privacy/the-privacy-act) - Office of the Australian Information Commissioner

### Sectoral Regulations
- [HHS HIPAA Portal](https://www.hhs.gov/hipaa/index.html) - Health information privacy resources
- [FERPA Guidance](https://studentprivacy.ed.gov/) - Educational privacy resources
- [COPPA Rule](https://www.ftc.gov/legal-library/browse/rules/childrens-online-privacy-protection-rule-coppa) - Children's online privacy protection

## Privacy Frameworks and Standards

- [NIST Privacy Framework](https://www.nist.gov/privacy-framework) - Voluntary framework for privacy risk management
- [ISO/IEC 27701:2019](https://www.iso.org/standard/71670.html) - Privacy information management extension to ISO 27001
- [OECD Privacy Guidelines](https://www.oecd.org/digital/ieconomy/privacy-guidelines.htm) - International privacy principles
- [Privacy by Design Framework](https://www.ipc.on.ca/wp-content/uploads/resources/7foundationalprinciples.pdf) - Ann Cavoukian's 7 foundational principles
- [APEC Privacy Framework](https://www.apec.org/publications/2017/08/apec-privacy-framework-(2015)) - Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation privacy principles

## Technical Tools and Resources

### Privacy Impact Assessment
- [ICO DPIA Template](https://ico.org.uk/media/for-organisations/documents/2553993/dpia-template.docx) - Data Protection Impact Assessment template
- [CNIL PIA Software](https://www.cnil.fr/en/open-source-pia-software-helps-carry-out-data-protection-impact-assessment) - Free open-source DPIA tool
- [NIST Privacy Risk Assessment Methodology](https://www.nist.gov/privacy-framework/nist-pram) - Structured approach to privacy risk assessment

### Data Mapping and Inventory
- [OneTrust Data Inventory](https://www.onetrust.com/products/data-discovery/) - Commercial data mapping solution
- [BigID Data Discovery](https://bigid.com/platform/data-discovery/) - AI-powered data discovery
- [Open Data Inventory Template](https://github.com/eProsima/Data-Discovery-Service) - Open-source data inventory framework

### Privacy-Enhancing Technologies
- [OpenMined](https://www.openmined.org/) - Privacy-preserving machine learning
- [ARX Data Anonymization Tool](https://arx.deidentifier.org/) - Open-source data anonymization
- [Privatar](https://www.privitar.com/) - Data privacy platform
- [Apple Differential Privacy](https://www.apple.com/privacy/docs/Differential_Privacy_Overview.pdf) - Apple's approach to differential privacy

### Encryption Tools
- [OpenSSL](https://www.openssl.org/) - Cryptography toolkit
- [GnuPG](https://gnupg.org/) - Free implementation of the OpenPGP standard
- [VeraCrypt](https://www.veracrypt.fr/) - Disk encryption software
- [Signal Protocol](https://signal.org/docs/) - End-to-end encryption protocol

### Consent Management
- [Consent Management Platforms Comparison](https://iapp.org/resources/article/consent-management-platforms/) - IAPP comparison
- [OneTrust Cookie Consent](https://www.onetrust.com/products/cookie-consent/) - Commercial consent solution
- [Cookiebot](https://www.cookiebot.com/) - GDPR, CCPA & ePrivacy consent solution
- [Osano](https://www.osano.com/) - Consent management platform
